immunedeconv2 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

anndata_check_load()

Checks if anndata package is loaded

bisque_reference_decomp()

Calculates the decomposition using the bisque algorithm

build_anndata()

Create anndata object from single cell expression matrix, cell type labels and gene symbols

build_model()

Building the signature matrix

bulk

Example RNA-seq dataset from Hoek et al.

bulk_small

Small example RNA-seq dataset from Hoek et al.

cell_type_annotations

Cell type annotations for the example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

cell_type_annotations_small

Cell type annotations for the small example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

deconvolute()

Deconvolution

deconvolute_MOMF()

Deconvolution Analysis using MOMF (via Nonnegative Factorization)

deconvolute_dwls()

Calculates the decomposition using the dwls algorithm

deconvolution_methods

List of supported immune deconvolution methods

fbind()

Bind two factors

fcount()

Make a sorted frequency table for a factor

get_single_cell_expression_set()

Generating a single cell expression set

init_python()

Initiates python environment

install_scaden()

Install Scaden

python_available()

Checks if python is available in environment

read_anndata()

Read anndata object (.h5ad format)

scaden_build_model()

Builds Scaden Model from scRNA data

scaden_checkload()

Checks if scaden is installed.

scaden_deconvolute()

Performs deconvolution

scaden_predict()

Predict cell proportions

scaden_process()

Pre-processes training data

scaden_simulate()

Simulates training data from scRNA data

scaden_simulate_example()

Simulates example Data provided by Scaden

scaden_train()

Trains a Scaden model

set_python()

Defines python path.

single_cell_data

Example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

single_cell_data_small

Small example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

write_anndata()

Write anndata object (.h5ad format)
